name: Super Robot Taisen Complete Box
summary: A collection of the original Super Robot Wars series consisting of Super Robot Wars 2, 3, and EX, remade for the original PlayStation. The game's graphics are enhanced and the systems and mechanics within are updated to match those of Super Robot Wars F and F Final. An included second disc is an encyclopedia, containing a collection of cut scenes and voice data from the first game along with a two player versus mode.
